title: [docs] Improve existing documentation
body_html:
There are some minor typographical errors in the documentation page for math operations. http://pytorch.org/docs/master/torch.html#math-operations

I have listed them down below (tentative list):

  • Add formulae for erf and erfinv
  • Maintain consistent doc for exp and expm1 (like log and log1p)
  • Modify mathematical symbols in ge, le, ne.
  • Math display fixes for addbmm, geqrf, gesv, orgqr, ormqr, ...

I could issue a PR with some changes. Please let me know if this is fine.

body:
There are some minor typographical errors in the documentation page for math operations. http://pytorch.org/docs/master/torch.html#math-operations

I have listed them down below (tentative list):
+ Add formulae for `erf` and `erfinv`
+ Maintain consistent doc for `exp` and `expm1` (like `log` and `log1p`)
+ Modify mathematical symbols in `ge`, `le`, `ne`.
+ Math display fixes for `addbmm`, `geqrf`, `gesv`, `orgqr`, `ormqr`, ...

I could issue a PR with some changes. Please let me know if this is fine.
